author: Anthony Rivas, Gerry Wagschal
title: Researchers studying monkeys for a coronavirus vaccine facing challenges
description: Dr. Skip Bohm hopes his research at the Tulane National Primate Research Center will help save thousands from COVID-19.
content:
In Louisiana, amid skyrocketing rates of the novel coronavirus and a statewide stay-at-home order, scientists are finding themselves face-to-face with the virus they hope to develop a vaccine for.
